item.description: Do you support all popular desktop spreadsheet formulas?

xml.item: We aim to support the various formulas supported by desktop spreadsheet packages. Please check out the Numbler Formula Documentation for more information.

item.description: Can I reference other Numbler spreadsheets?

xml.item: Yes. Numbler supports the syntax =sheetname!cellreference. in Excel® you might use something like =Sheet2!C2C4. In numbler we use the sheet identifer (the unique ID that you see in your URL) as part of the formula, e.g =ynsVbU0rQdFtFnot!C2C4. We plan to make this easier in the near future.
